provider.title: Provider
provider.instruction: Go to the root of your application and do this:
provider.mainInstruction: to work correctly, you need to set up the ThemeProvider at the root of your application.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Redshank automatically handles the dark and light theme you can change using a useTheme function.

hooks.description: You can access all values of the current theme

home.title: Getting started
home.instruction: Inside your React project directory, install @redshank/native by running either of the following:
home.description:
documentation! Redshank allows you to make beautiful, modern, and
        fast mobile/applications regardless of your design experience, created
        with React and React Native.

defaultTheme.title: Default Theme
defaultTheme.description: Redshank default theme is based on React Context API.
defaultTheme.instruction: Redshank includes a default color palette out-of-the-box that is a great starting point if you don't have your own specific branding in mind. You can access the colors through the theme object, see the
